entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Ear Falls
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 8:38 PM CST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -27.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Ear Falls 10:00 PM CST Sunday 29 January 2023
Temperature: -27.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.5 kPa falling
Humidity: 74 %

Dewpoint: -30.5°C
Wind: WNW 9 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 32. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light after midnight. Low minus 32. Wind chill minus 33 this evening and minus 42 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Sunny. High minus 24.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h in the morning. High minus 24. Wind chill minus 42 in the morning and minus 34 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 29 January 2023
